So would you go around everywhere if you could not sleep? I think it would be dangerous.
Besides, one needs to sleep. As Tinku's mother explained.
Tinku is friendly. The next story will introduce us to a boy with a heart of gold. He is so kind and generous.
 When you give something, you will get something. In this story, we shall see what happens to the boy who is always ready to give, who is always kind.
